headline: Why Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Is Up 10.5% After Raising 2026 EPS Guidance and Buying Back Shares
summary: Teledyne Technologies reported full-year 2025 results on January 21, 2026, with sales of US$6,115.4 million, net income of US$894.8 million, and GAAP diluted EPS from continuing operations of US$18.88, alongside new 2026 EPS guidance of US$4.45–US$4.59 for Q1 and US$19.76–US$20.22 for the year. Management’s willingness to issue higher full-year earnings guidance soon after completing a US$400 million share repurchase adds weight to the company’s confidence in its operations and capital...

content.title: Why Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Is Up 10.5% After Raising 2026 EPS Guidance and Buying Back Shares
content.summary: Teledyne Technologies reported full-year 2025 results on January 21, 2026, with sales of US$6,115.4 million, net income of US$894.8 million, and GAAP diluted EPS from continuing operations of US$18.88, alongside new 2026 EPS guidance of US$4.45–US$4.59 for Q1 and US$19.76–US$20.22 for the year. Management’s willingness to issue higher full-year earnings guidance soon after completing a US$400 million share repurchase adds weight to the company’s confidence in its operations and capital...
